籤詩版本二:
Kamar swan da ke tashi daga keji, ina so in sami sabon jiki amma ba zan iya ba.
Yana da wuya a fita daga arewa, kudu, gabas ko yamma, wannan hexagram yana tsoron ƙiyayya.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana kama da swan yana jefa kansa cikin ruwa ( keji).
Komai ya fi komai da komai kuma ba na gaske bane.
解曰: Ba shi yiwuwa (ba) shiga jiki ba. Komawa shine zama (a) iyawa. Kayar da kai kasa ka mike. Duk a ciki.
籤詩故事一:
◇Qin ya ci nasara tare da kama kwamandoji uku
Duke Mu na Qin bai saurari shawarar tsohon ministansa Jian Gong ba, ya kuma aika da sojoji don kai hari a jihar Zheng, ya yi yaki da mutanen Jin a birnin Huo (wanda ke tsakanin gundumar Luoning da lardin Shaanxian na lardin Henan na kasar Sin).
Dakarun Jin sun rutsa da sojojin Qin cikin wani kwari mai hatsari, hanyar da ke gaba ta toshe, sojojin Jin na bangarorin biyu sun yi ta jefa wuta da sulfur da gishiri, sojojin Jin da ke bayansu sun yi ta kashe su da kakkausar murya, sojojin Qin sun tattake junansu, lamarin da ya haifar da tashin hankali. marasa adadi.
Aka ci su kuma aka kame dukkanin janar-janar guda uku.
聖意: Rashin kwanciyar hankali a gida, kansa ya kama, neman kuɗi, mugu, ciniki, lalata aure, rauni mai laifi, Liujia, azabtarwa, fashi, hana masu tafiya a ƙasa, rashin tsutsotsi na siliki, annoba ta dabbobi shida, bacewar mutane, shari’a, bala’i, ƙaura, asara mara kyau. dukiya, munanan cututtuka, yada tsaunuka da kaburbura
古人: Qin ya ci nasara kuma ya kama kwamandojin uku
